channel.title: Zero-Trust on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Zero-Trust on Arrans github.io

item.title: openziti/zrok
item.description: Geo-scale, next-generation peer-to-peer sharing platform built on top of OpenZiti.

item.title: openziti/ziti
item.description: The parent project for OpenZiti. Here you will find the executables for a fully zero trust, application embedded, programmable network @OpenZiti

item.title: codenotary/immudb
item.description: immudb - immutable database based on zero trust, SQL/Key-Value/Document model, tamperproof, data change history

item.title: warrant-dev/warrant
item.description: Warrant is a highly scalable, centralized authorization service based on Google Zanzibar. Use it to define, enforce, query, and audit application authorization and access control.
